participant_1.name: James
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, James is passionate about his work despite facing challenges from his family. He enjoys the finer things in life and has a keen interest in fashion.
participant_1.background: my family does not support my career choices. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping. i currently work for a watch dealer.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Lily is playful and imaginative, often expressing herself through songs and playful conversations. She has a vivid imagination and a sweet tooth for chocolate.
participant_2.background: i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i am four years old. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog.
